name: ThetaPrime
short_description:
ThetaPrime is a "derivative" of RICOH THETA viewer.

Features:
- View multiple spherical images at a time
- Separate aperture and zoom control
- "Latitude" warping

Usage:
1. Drop THETA spherical image(s) or any image(s) on the window.
2. Change the view with the following mouse operations:
- Left Drag = Rotate
- Right Drag = Aperture
- [Shift] + Right Drag = Warp
- Wheel = Zoom

* If [Ctrl] key is pressed at the end of dragging, the operation will continue without slowing down.
* If [Alt] key is pressed at the end of dragging, the operation will stop immediately without inertial motion.

Requirements:
- .NET 2.0
- OpenGL SL 1.10

Dependency:
- OpenTK 1.1
- Fugue Icons (http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/)
